defect-heatmap.include.markdownDescription:
A [glob pattern](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#GlobPattern) that defines the files to search for. The glob pattern will be matched against the file paths of resulting matches relative to their workspace. Use a [relative pattern](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#RelativePattern) to restrict the search results to a [workspace folder](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#WorkspaceFolder).

Warning: The more files that are included, the longer it will take to generate the heatmap.

defect-heatmap.enableExclude.markdownDescription: Enable the exlude pattern. If disabled, exclude is treated as `undefined`, and the default excludes will apply.

defect-heatmap.exclude.markdownDescription:
A [glob pattern](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#GlobPattern) that defines the files and folders to exclude. The glob pattern will be matched against the file paths of resulting matches relative to their workspace. When `undefined` only default excludes will apply, when `null` no excludes will apply. If enabled, but left blank, it will be treated as `null`.

Warning: The more files that are included, the longer it will take to generate the heatmap.

defect-heatmap.extraGitArgs.markdownDescription: The value of this field will be added, as is, onto the end of the `git` command used to fetch the logs for each line.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
